verbs.description: jd com billionaire liu qiangdong [V: was] arrested in the us over an accusation of rape police records say liu qiangdong also known as richard was detained for 16 hours in minneapolis over the weekend he was released with no charges and no bail requirement and returned to china shortly after jd com said liu had been falsely accused the company shares fell following news of liu arrest police us richard south china morning post minneapolis liu qiangdong liu founder and ceo rape associated press
